llm_res.rule: approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
The function `name` should return the name of the token. OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
Transfers of 0 values must be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
